title: Looking to make a ranked team Silver-Gold
body:
Looking for Silver 3+ players to play ranked with. All roles expect JG :P

Requirements as follows
-Good map awareness for tp's
-Must be able to work with teammates/work well in a team environment
 - Have good internet connection - 70ms or lower
 - Ability to understand things like lane swaps and rotation
- Mostly available every afternoon/evenings and some weekends (You don't have to turn up all the time :D)
 - Be able to play multiple play styles (Aggressive, passive)
 - Champion pool of at least 3 champs with mastery 5+
- Can't be toxic.
- Must have discord for comms.

Add me @ LegitBit on the OCE server

replies.body: have 1 account s4 have 2 account s5 Damn guess I cant join s3+ team
yeah it's a bit requirement heavy haha
